dt: {bc}skiing in a zigzag or wavy course between upright obstacles (such as flags)
{bc}a timed race (as on skis or in an automobile or kayak) over a winding or zigzag course past a series of flags or markers

shortdef: skiing in a zigzag or wavy course between upright obstacles (such as flags)
a timed race (as on skis or in an automobile or kayak) over a winding or zigzag course past a series of flags or markers; broadly : movement over a zigzag route

dt: {bc}to move over a zigzag course in or as if in a slalom

shortdef: to move over a zigzag course in or as if in a slalom

dt: {bc}a slalom race for skiers on a longer and steeper course than that used for the regular slalom

shortdef: a slalom race for skiers on a longer and steeper course than that used for the regular slalom
